property.name: phone_flow
property.value: insert into mobile_phone_flow values(?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE phoneupflow=?,phonedownflow=?,phonetotalflow=?

property.name: flow_Num
property.value: insert into mobile_phonenum values(?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count=?

property.name: flow_pv
property.value: insert into mobile_phonepv values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count=?
